mapper.insert: insert into rbac_sessions (session_id, session_create_time, session_last_modify_time, session_valid, session_content) values (#{sessionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sessionCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sessionLastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sessionValid,jdbcType=BIT}, #{sessionContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select session_id, session_create_time, session_last_modify_time, session_valid, session_content from rbac_sessions where session_id = #{sessionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select session_id, session_create_time, session_last_modify_time, session_valid, session_content from rbac_sessions
